title: Omicron drives major surge in S Africa Covid cases

title: Russia warns of military confrontation nightmare

title: Michigan school shooter charged as an adult
content: The 15-year-old killed four students in an "absolutely premeditated" attack, say prosecutors.

title: Scientists find trigger for rare AstraZeneca clots
content: Researchers in Cardiff and the US work out how the Covid jab may be linked to the extremely rare clots.

content: The WTA announces the immediate suspension amid concern for Chinese tennis player Peng Shuai.

title: Disney appoints its first female chair
